name: Bloc (itch) (Tyson Wetton)
description:
A small game I decided to try making for a uni assessment, inspired by Croc (especially in the name) and Super Mario 64.

Some things I would like to fix in future:

- Game Over music

- Void in background

- Actual models that aren't just basic shapes

- Some actual camera controls

That being said it was only made for a small assignment and so I might not really have time to go and work on it much again.
